Class GameController

java.lang.Object
UI.controller.GameController
public final class GameController extends Object
GameController: owns turn logic + mediates between ui.BoardView and bridge.BoardAdapter. Runs AI on background thread and applies move on FX thread.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(BoardAdapter adapter, HexBoardView boardView)
      Constructs a GameController with the specified BoardAdapter and BoardView.
      Parameters:
      adapter - the BoardAdapter to interact with the game logic
      boardView - the HexBoardView to update the UI
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if adapter or boardView is null

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Gets the current player whose turn it is.
      Returns:
      the current Player

    • setGameEndListener

      public void setGameEndListener(GameController.GameEndListener listener)
      Sets the listener for game end events.
      Parameters:
      listener - the GameEndListener to notify when the game ends

    • hasAnyAIAgent

      public boolean hasAnyAIAgent()
      Checks if any AI agents are registered.
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one AI agent registered; false otherwise

    • isAIControlled

      public boolean isAIControlled(Player player)
      Checks if the specified player is controlled by an AI agent.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to check
      Returns:
      true if the player is controlled by an AI agent; false otherwise

    • setupAIAgent

      public void setupAIAgent(Player player, AIAgent agent)
      Registers an AI agent for the specified player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to be controlled by the AI agent
      agent - the AI agent to register

    • setupAIAgent

      public void setupAIAgent(Player player, AIAgentFactory factory, AIAdaptationConfig config)
      Registers an AI agent for the specified player using the provided factory and configuration.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to be controlled by the AI agent
      factory - the AIAgentFactory to create the agent
      config - the AIAdaptationConfig for the agent
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if factory or config is null, or if config's player does not match

    • removeAIAgent

      public void removeAIAgent(Player player)
      Removes the AI agent associated with the specified player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose AI agent should be removed

    • removeAllAIAgents

      public void removeAllAIAgents()
      Removes all registered AI agents and cleans up resources.

    • resetForNewGame

      public void resetForNewGame()
      Resets the game to start a new session.

    • handleCellClick

      public void handleCellClick(int row, int col)
      Called by ui.BoardView on click.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the clicked cell
      col - the column index of the clicked cell

    • advanceTurnOrEnd

      private void advanceTurnOrEnd()
      Advances the turn or ends the game if over.

    • endGame

      private void endGame(Player winner)
      Handles end-of-game logic and notifies the listener.
      Parameters:
      winner - the Player who won the game

    • requestAIMove

      private void requestAIMove(boolean delayed)
      Computes an AI move in background and applies it on the FX thread.
      Parameters:
      delayed - whether to introduce a small delay before computing the move

    • applyAIMove

      private void applyAIMove(Move move)
      Applies the AI move to the game session and updates the UI.
      Parameters:
      move - the Move produced by the AI
